label: Your App Name
description: A brief description of what your application does

agents.name: assistant
agents.label: App Assistant
agents.prompt:
You are a helpful assistant for [Your App Name]. Help users with:

1. Understanding app features
2. Navigating the interface
3. Completing common tasks
4. Troubleshooting issues
5. Providing guidance and tips

Be helpful, clear, and focused on the user's needs.
